Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh? Looks like there's a party in the Gray Raven lounge!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Let Nanami see what the Gray Ravens are up to!', 4: '1'}
{3: '...The Gray Raven Commandant sitting in the middle, wearing a strange headgear, with Liv whispering something beside. Lee and Kamui are arguing heatedly over something.'}
{3: 'What they have in common is that they are all holding their controllers hard in their hands.'}
{3: "Nanami's hand sneakily plants her hand on the terminal of the lounge."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '(How can they leave Nanami out of such FUN!)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "(Aaaand... Done! Next, time for Nanami's showtime!)", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: '(Ah! Then I might as well... And get everyone together to...)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "(Oh? What's this? Let's have a lookie...)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You take off the device and see the suspicious Nanami doing her suspicious things to the terminal.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Those strange questions just now, those were Nanami's doing...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami wanted to ask some interesting questions, but you just wouldn't answer them!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'But whatever! Nanami is going to keep playing!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami saw a watermelon on the beach just now!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'And from the old files, humans always do this on the beach—they smash watermelons blindfolded!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But Nanami never understood the point of this... Maybe I'll understand if I get to experience it!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Commandant! Liv! Why did you two suddenly exit the game? Weird things are popping up on the beach! Hurry back!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "We're coming now! Lee! You're still in the game, right?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Um, I don't have time to explain now... But we can't let Nanami break the watermelon! That watermelon is...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The watermelon is the reward for the beach volleyball earlier, and a very important mission item.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Really? It's my first time hearing about it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'A "tragedy that can\'t be undone" will happen, and we\'ll fail the mission.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "So we can't let Nanami destroy the mission target.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Right now, Lee stands alone on the beach.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'So while the commandant and the others are trying to reconnect to the game, Lee will have to protect the mission item.'}
{3: 'Lee nods. He rushes over with a serious look, the same as ever.'}
{3: '——Donning the armor that is a swimsuit, Lee enters a duel on the battlefield that is the beach.'}
